dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: Oh, man...
Air sighed out of the sofa as the child rested on its cushion. He lifted his legs and placed his leather boot-wearing-feet on the desk.
As soon as he sat down, everyone around him began busily going through the contents of their pockets...

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: Hm? Ooh, that one looks good. I'll try that cig today.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: Yessir!

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: Gotta light, anyone~?

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: Here it is, sir!
One of the nearest sailors quickly ran up to the child with a lighter.
The child motioned with his chin as though he'd grown accustomed to this royal treatment and let his underling light his cigarette. He breathed in a lungful of smoke.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: Hoo... This ain't so bad. Which port didya snag this from?

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: We found it from one of our 'guests'. If you wish, sir, we could...

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: Nah, don't worry about it. Don't want them to get a heart attack and bite it or anything. This cig'll get old soon anyway.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: Understood, sir.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: Well, anyways...

The child flicked the ashes on one of the pirates' hands, who'd been standing there with open palms like a human ashtray. He took a sweeping look at his crew, drawing another heavy hit from the cigarette.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: Right, time for a morning assembly. How are our side jobs doing? Let's hear some reports. Starting from you. Yeah, you there. To my left.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: Yes sir! We of the Mermaid Perfume department have captured ourselves a new species of Mermaids, and...
As soon as the child gives his order, the crew begins listing the state of their respective departments.
Sales figures from various products such as Mermaid perfume, ice cream, et cetra... Different numbers and statistics went in one ear and out the other.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: ... Hm, well. Okay.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: So it's all shit, then. Am I wrong?

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: What's wrong? Cat got your tongues? C'mon, I'm not trying to blame anyone here~

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: None of them's our main moneymaker anyway... So let's get to our actual business.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: ... How are our 'guests' doing?

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: We currently have a total of 6 guests in our lodgings, including the one we snagged recently.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: And how many customers do we have, looking to get our 'guests' back?

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: We currently have two in active negotiation, sir. They say that one of them's pretty loaded, and came from one of the Nests...

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: Whoo. Nice~

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: Oh, and, and one thing of note for one of our guests, sir.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: We managed to snag somebody sent from... some company. Apparently, a Team Leader of sorts. Maybe we can really milk this one dry, sir.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: Oho, a Team Leader, eh? Now that's a catch.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: Seemed a bit... green for a Team Leader, but I don't believe that to be of much concern, first mate. Sir.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: Aw. Yeah, you did good work~

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: Sorry about all the trouble, guys~ Having to listen to a lowly first mate in the Captain's absence... Sucks, don't it?

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: Not at all, sir!

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: Naw, I understand~ Sigh. Hook, that bastard... Used to be a lot more reliable when we sailed the high seas... But as soon as we're docked, poof! Gone, off to drown in that fairy wine or whatever.
The child grumbles in a half-joking, half-serious manner, but none of the crew laughed nor moved. They stood stiff and still like new recruits.
They were awfully rigid for pirates, but...
They had a good reason to be.
And that... was why this man of such casual, seemingly laid-back disposition was the first mate of the pirates.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: Look here, now!
Aaahhh!!

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: Oh~ Don't freak out, now. Thrash about a little too much, and I just might slip and take your whole noggin clean off. If something so unfortunate were to happen... well, don't blame me, 'kay?
... Gulp.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: Now, lookee here~ My future guest~

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content:
This here is called a pistol. With a little POW!... you can get a new hole to breathe out of. Why don't you say hello to my little friend?
You know, taxes make it one expensive friend to keep.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: Ooh, don't you nod your little head too hard. I messed with the trigger mechanism... and now it's really a hair-trigger.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: So I'd like you to answer with a blink~ Not that you've got much to say.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: From now on, you'll be our 'guest'. You've got rich friends, rich family, hmm?

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: Yeah, just like that. Just blink. Chill with us here until your friends get here with the ransom, 'kay? Play nice, and I won't kill ya. Ain't that nice?

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates First Mate
dataList.content: Not gonna blink? Eyes too dry? Want some eye drops? Still got some fight in ya, is that it?
N-no! Not at...

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: ... Gulp.
With him doing this to every new guest in front of the whole crew, how could they not be afraid?
Maybe this 'Captain Hook' knew this child's talents. Maybe that's why the child was left to take charge in the Captain's absence.
Captain Hook didn't seem to mind how annoyed the child was, though. Probably didn't even care to find out.
